[{"id":"dev-17830","entityId":"86-23107","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Barcodes] [Customer Contacts] Data import templates are not available for download"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Khristich"},{"name":"created","value":"1583254379768"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17830"},{"name":"description","value":"

|URL|https://www.regiondo-dev-uk.de/reseller/specialcodes/upload|
|URL|https://www.regiondo-test-uk.de/crm/customer/import|
|:-------|-------:|
|Account email|reservation@supplierdomain.com|
|Environment|testing, staging|

NOTE:

This issue is reproducible for both customer contacts and barcodes import templates. Coupon codes import templates download works correctly though.
This issue is reproducible on staging and on testing

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Log into the dashboard as supplier
  2. Navigate to Tickets Validation > Upload Barcodes
  3. Click the + Upload Barcodes button
  4. Click Download, then select any file format

Actual result:

Upload Barcodes page is re-opened in a new browser tab. Template download hasn't started. The following error message is displayed:
An error has occurred. Please try again.

Expected result:

The template of a selected file format is downloaded.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Yana Pysotska"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"akhristich"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Yana_Pysotska"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1583926331241"},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["To be delivered on staging"],"valueId":["To be delivered on staging"],"color":{"bg":"#409600","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["Bronze"],"valueId":["Bronze"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Screen Shot 2020-03-03 at 18.16.43.png","id":"89-67209","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/Screen%20Shot%202020-03-03%20at%2018.16.43.png?file=89-67209&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-66482","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-17830","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Yana Pysotska Maksym Hopei Do you know to which ticket this could be related. We need to solve this issue before the release
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583505562537,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66547","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17830","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Ilya Shevyrev, please create tmp sub-directory in /var/www/app/var when magento container starts. Application assumes it exists.

@Walid Dechri, the issue is related to the new infrastructure on testing and staging and won't production. I unlinked it from the release.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583852736872,"updated":1583852905810,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66558","author":"ilya.shevyrev","authorFullName":"Ilya Shevyrev","issueId":"dev-17830","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei this is done with https://bitbucket.jsmd-group.com/projects/RGDO/repos/regiondo-app/pull-requests/267/overview
Please check.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583876716391,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66572","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17830","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Ilya Shevyrev, tried it on testing right after deployment. Works good for me, thanks.
QA, please test by yourself.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583920374605,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66583","author":"Yana_Pysotska","authorFullName":"Yana Pysotska","issueId":"dev-17830","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Tested on testing environment on demoaccount@regiondo.de in Chrome version 80.0.3987.106 and Windows 10
Templates all file formats (CSV, XLS, XLSX) are downloaded.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583926308022,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17414","entityId":"86-22920","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"Fatal Error in worker"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Oleksandr Ivashchenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1582118504391"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17414"},{"name":"description","value":"

PHP logs on worker server have a lot of errors:
[19-Feb-2020 10:17:36 UTC] PHP Fatal error: Uncaught TypeError: Argument 2 passed to Regiondo_Product_Model_Sales_Request::addChangeItemsRequest() must be of the type integer, null given, called in /var/www/app/app/code/local/Regiondo/Product/Model/BookingManagement/AlterBooking.php on line 245 and defined in /var/www/app/app/code/local/Regiondo/Product/Model/Sales/Request.php:289

@Sergey Dorogavcev, please review:

  • Magento: https://upsource.regiondo.de/regiondo/review/RGND-CR-1841
  • API: https://upsource.regiondo.de/regiondo-api/review/RA-CR-133
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582282139339,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66402","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17414","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Reducing the level to normal, because the fatal error is already fixed on prod, this ticket only comes with improvements.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583324635776,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"v.karenko"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"v.karenko"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1579785946662"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-16027","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":{"bg":"#e0f1fb","fg":"#3d85c6"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}]
